long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Last bookmarks app you will ever need. No matter what happens in your life: lost your computer? lost your phone? re-installed a system, bought a new device? Using someone else's device? Whatever it may be, you can always count on a easy way to get access to you extension.

FEATURES:
✦ Search through bookmarks
✦ Easily sync from browser and to browser
✦ Dark theme, light theme
✦ Disable delete confirmations if you want
✦ Simple ease of use
✦ Bookmarks are saved in the cloud for indefinite availability
✦ Bookmarks are saved  locally for fast load times
✦ Access to bookmarks on mobile in the web dashboard
✦ Access to bookmarks even offline in the web dashboard (Load dashboard online at least once to work)
✦Bookmarks are encrypted
✦Select folder/collection/category to be your main, so when you open the app, it opens into that folder/collection.category
✦Create temporary bookmarks that will self delete after a month
